title: Start
body:
<<move Aig StageLeft2>><<move Lee StageRight2>>
<<outfit Aig Casual>> 
<<outfit Lee Casual>> 
<<expression Aig Neutral>>
<<expression Lee Neutral>>
<<name Friendship Lee>> 
Aigburth, your singing has improved lately.
->Thanks!
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Aig: Oh, thanks!
    You beam with pride.
->I think it still needs work...
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Aig: I think it still needs work.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    Lee: That's a good attitude to have.
    Lee: But just make sure not to work yourself too hard.
    Aig: Okay!
->Really?
    Aig: Oh really?
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    Lee: Don't fish for more compliments, Aiggy. It's not attractive.
